snippet: A journalist was also hurt in Ankara, the capital. Officials in Turkey blamed the attack on a homegrown Marxist group.
abstract: Suicide bomber attacks American Embassy in Turkish capital Ankara, killing himself and Turkish security guard; attack raises new fears about protection of American diplomats serving in region; Turkish authorities blame incident on homegrown Marxist organization.

byline.original: By TIM ARANGO and SEBNEM ARSU
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Rick Gladstone from New York, Michael R. Gordon and Eric Schmitt from Washington, and Nicholas Kulish from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: A journalist was also hurt in Ankara, the capital. Officials in Turkey blamed the attack on a homegrown Marxist group.

headline.seo: 2 Dead in Suicide Bombing at U.S. Embassy in Turkey
headline.main: Suicide Blast Kills U.S. Embassy Guard in Turkey
headline.print_headline: Blast at U.S. Embassy in Turkey Stirs Fear for Diplomats’ Safety
